biography.name: Dr. Carlos E. Cortés
biography.title: Edward A. Dickson Emeritus Professor of History
biography.bio: Pioneering figure in multicultural education, ethnic studies, and diversity scholarship with a career spanning over five decades. Dr. Cortés has produced more than four hundred literary works covering Chicano studies, Latin American history, diversity in media, intercultural communication, and anti-racism education. His career includes groundbreaking scholarship, creative writing, and extensive consulting work for media and educational institutions.
